prompt: Cartoon style animation. The same character Golu, a 7-year-old boy with a round face and messy black hair in his yellow t-shirt and blue shorts, looking determined with sweat on his brow. He is walking along a long, dusty path, carrying a heavy clay pot filled with water. He is carefully pouring the last drops of water onto his small, thirsty sapling in the middle of the dry field.
